QuestData.Title: Violent Gale
QuestData.Description: There is a task that I can set before you.$B$BIt is a dangerous task. Completing it will help impress the more stubborn Stone Lords.$B$BTo the northwest is the Scoured Reach. Severe winds batter the rock and hide the true living threat underneath.$B$BWithin the Scoured Reach are Gyreworms. They devour rock and move through it as if it were water. They do the same thing to our rocky skin.$B$BFind Felsen the Enduring. Have him direct you to the Crumbling Depths. I will speak to you once you get that far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Felsen the Enduring and follow his instruction towards the entrance to the Crumbling Depths.
QuestData.RewardText: <The ground rumbles slightly as you approach the cave. This looks to be the entrance that Diamant and Felsen spoke of.>

Objectives.Objective: Find the entrance to the Crumbling Depths
